extension.description: This module adds an pop-up lightbox window when the page is accessed/refreshed.

field.name: popup_type
field.label: Source type
field.description: Choose what kind of pop-up is this.

field.name: popup_url
field.label: SOURCE
field.description: Add here the url of what you want to open. Don't forget http://

field.name: popup_title
field.label: Popup Title
field.description: Add here the title you want to display above.

field.name: popup_description
field.label: Popup Description
field.description: Add here the description you want to display in the popup.

field.name: popup_width
field.label: Popup Width (px)
field.description: eg: 400 (without px, add unit when using % percent)

field.name: popup_height
field.label: Popup Height (px)
field.description: eg: 400 (without px, add unit when using % percent)

field.name: popup_autohide
field.label: Autohide Popup?
field.description: Do you want to autoclose the popup?

field.name: popup_timeout
field.label: Autohide delay (ms)
field.description: Time of self closing. 8000 means 8 seconds

field.name: inline_content_id
field.label: Unique ID
field.description: Add a unique ID that will associate the link with the actual hidden content.

field.name: inline_content_value
field.label: Content
field.description: Content of what you want to add inside this container
